trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the transport must ensure that the URI provided for the service to listen on is unique or can be used exactly as provided.
trans-unit.target: 指示传输是否必须确保提供给服务侦听的 URI 是唯一的或可以完全按原样使用。

trans-unit.source: The URI for the endpoint on which a service listens can be set programmatically using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> property and the value of the ListenUriMode for that endpoint is set using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以编程方式设置服务在其上侦听的终结点的 URI<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>属性，并且为该终结点 ListenUriMode 的值设置使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> is Explicit.

The value of these properties may also be set using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A> property and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以设置这些属性的值使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A>属性和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the ListenUriMode is set to Unique the transport is responsible for creating a unique URI.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ListenUriMode 的值设置为唯一传输将负责创建唯一 URI。

trans-unit.source: Different transports used by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] generate this unique URI differently - For TCP in exclusive mode (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> is `false`) this means binding to a uniquely available port number.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用传输不同[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]生成此唯一 URI 以不同方式-独占模式下的 TCP (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A>是`false`) 这意味着绑定到一个唯一可用端口号。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - For TCP in port sharing mode (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> is `true`) and for all of the other existing [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transports, this means appending a unique path (a GUID) to the end of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -对于端口共享模式下的 TCP (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A>是`true`) 以及所有其他现有[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]传输，这意味着将一条唯一路径 (一个 GUID) 追加到末尾<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> is set to Explicit mode, the transport uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> exactly as it is provided, without modifying it to make it unique.
trans-unit.target: 时的值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A>设置为显式模式下，传输使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>完全原样，而无需修改以使其唯一。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the transport should use a transport-specific mechanism to ensure that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri*> is unique.
trans-unit.target: 指定传输应使用特定于传输的机制来确保<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri*>是唯一的。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri*>
